name: kitpix
description: Optimize images in SvelteKit with build-time and client-side features.
readme: # kitpix ## TODO - README - Base Image component (srcset generation, etc.) - Different integrations (imgix & cloudinary to start) - placeholder prop (base64, blurhash, or ``) - build-time optimization (vite build tools) - generate placeholders during build time as well - [create](https://dev.to/dreitzner/use-sveltekit-to-create-npm-packages-3l6i) & [publish](https://zellwk.com/blog/publish-to-npm/) package
